title: Supply Chain Manager Dropshipping $$$$
description:
Supply Chain Manager: Negotiate Better Deals & Prevent Chaos



We're scaling. That means supply problems are about to explode if we don't get ahead of them.

If you're the type who:



Gets energized by negotiating prices down 15-20%

Spots quality issues before they become customer complaints

Thinks "we should have 3 backup suppliers for this" when you see risk

Can't stand when shipping delays kill 
ntum



...keep reading.



What we're building:

6-figure/month e-commerce operation across Europe (Switzerland FR/DE, Italy, US expansion). Multiple D2C stores, 8+ active products, scaling aggressively.

The problem: We're scaling fast and supply issues will kill us if we don't manage them properly. No one is actively negotiating prices, managing quality, or preventing stockouts.

The solution: You.

You become the supply chain backbone — negotiating better deals, managing suppliers, and making sure products arrive on time with quality intact.



What you'll actually do:

Own the supply chain so we scale without chaos:

Supplier Management:



Negotiate prices with suppliers (AliExpress, 1688, private agents, warehouses)

Build relationships with key suppliers for better terms

Find 2-3 backup suppliers for every critical product

Vet new suppliers: quality, reliability, communication



Quality Control:



Set up quality check processes (photo inspections, sample orders)

Handle quality issues when products don't meet standards

Work with suppliers to fix problems before they reach customers

Track return rates by supplier and flag issues early



Inventory & Forecasting:



Monitor stock levels and forecast demand by product/market

Prevent stockouts on winning products (we can't sell if we're out of stock)

Coordinate with media buyer to know which products are scaling

Manage warehouse inventory if we use fulfillment centers



Shipping & Logistics:



Optimize shipping methods: cost vs speed tradeoffs

Handle customs issues and international shipping problems

Track delivery times by supplier and route

Find faster/cheaper shipping solutions when possible



Cost Optimization:



Constantly look for ways to reduce COGS without sacrificing quality

Negotiate bulk discounts when products scale

Find alternative sourcing options for high-volume products

Track margins and flag products where costs are eating profit





What makes you the right person:

? You're NOT someone who just places orders

? You negotiate, optimize, and prevent problems proactively

? You're NOT satisfied with "good enough" suppliers

? You always look for better deals and backup options

? You're NOT afraid of tough conversations

? You push suppliers when they mess up and hold them accountable

? You're NOT reactive

? You spot supply risks before they become crises



You should apply if:



E-commerce supply chain experience: You've managed suppliers for dropshipping or D2C brands

Negotiation skills: You've successfully negotiated prices down and improved terms

Quality-obsessed: You catch quality issues before customers do

Detail-oriented: You track COGS, shipping times, and margins closely

Problem solver: When something goes wrong, you fix it fast

Fluent English: Clear communication with suppliers and team

Available 30-40 hours/week



Bonus points if you have:



Experience with Chinese suppliers (AliExpress, 1688, private agents)

Experience with European shipping and customs

Relationships with existing suppliers or agents

Experience forecasting inventory for scaling products





What you get:



$6-$9/hour to start, negotiable based on experience

Performance bonuses: Negotiate better deals ? save us money ? you earn more

Direct impact on profit: Lower COGS = higher margins = more profit

Growth path: Prove yourself ? become Head of Supply Chain Operations

Long-term role: We're scaling to 7 figures, supply becomes more critical as we grow





This isn't for everyone.

If you just want to place orders and hope for the best — don't apply.

If you want to be the person who prevents supply disasters and negotiates killer deals — keep reading.



How to apply:



First sentence MUST include "SUPPLY" or we delete your application

Share an example of a time you negotiated a better deal with a supplier (what was the situation, what did you do, what was the result?)

Tell us which supplier platforms you've used (AliExpress, 1688, Alibaba, private agents, etc.)

Describe your process for vetting a new supplier (how do you check quality and reliability?)

Hours available per week + timezone



No generic applications. Show us you understand supply chain management, not just order placement.



Hiring process:



Top 10 candidates ? DISC test + typing test

10-minute intro call ? check: are you proactive? can you negotiate? do you spot risks?

Test task ? Vet a supplier and negotiate sample pricing

Follow-up call ? deeper supply chain questions

Hire within 3 days



Start date: Within 2-4 weeks (after Operations Manager is in place)

If you can negotiate better deals and prevent supply chaos — you're probably the right person. Apply now.

title: TikTok Ads Media Buyer: Scale E-Commerce Brands to 6-7 Figures
description:
We need a media buyer who's already done this before.

If you:



Have scaled e-commerce brands past $100K/month on TikTok Ads

What we're building:

We run a 6-figure/month e-commerce operation across Switzerland (FR/DE), Italy, and expanding to the US. Multiple D2C stores, 8+ active products, aggressive testing and scaling on TikTok Ads and Meta.

We need someone who owns the paid acquisition engine — testing, scaling, and keeping ROAS stable while we grow.



Your actual job:

Campaign Management:



Launch 3-5 new product tests per day with SmartPlus campaigns

Manage budget allocation across markets (CH-FR, CH-DE, IT, US)

Scale winners aggressively without killing ROAS

Data & Optimization:

Identify which products to scale vs kill based on data (not gut feeling)

Optimize ad spend to hit profit targets (we track net margin, not just ROAS)

Report daily: what's working, what's not, what needs changing

Use tools: TikTok Ads Manager, TrueProfit, Google Sheets for tracking



Technical Setup:



Set up pixels, Business Centers, and ad accounts independently

Troubleshoot tracking issues (pixel fires, attribution problems)

Handle DMCA or account flags without panic

Manage multiple ad accounts across different markets





What makes you the right person:

? You're NOT a beginner who "wants to learn TikTok Ads"

? You've already scaled brands to $50K-$100K/month+ on TikTok

? You're NOT someone who needs step-by-step instructions

? You know how to test, read data, and scale without micromanagement

? You're NOT just a "campaign launcher"

? You understand the entire funnel: creative ? campaign ? conversion ? profit

? You're NOT afraid of high ad spend

? You're comfortable managing $3K-$10K+ daily budgets



You should apply if:



Proven track record: You've scaled e-commerce brands on TikTok Ads (fashion, beauty, lifestyle, home goods — any category works)

Data-driven: You make decisions based on numbers, not feelings

Creative-minded: You understand what makes a TikTok ad work (hooks, trends, formats)

Fast executor: You test fast, kill fast, scale fast

Technical: Pixel setup, Business Center management, tracking troubleshooting — you've done it all

Independent: You don't wait for approval to make obvious optimizations

English fluent: Clear written and verbal communication (we're a global team)

Available 30-40 hours/week



Bonus points if you have:



Experience with European markets (Germany, Switzerland, Italy)

Experience scaling SmartPlus campaigns specifically

Knowledge of Meta Ads (we run both platforms)

Experience with multi-market campaigns (different languages, currencies)





What you get:



$8-$12/hour to start, negotiable based on results (we pay more as you scale profitably)

Performance bonuses: Hit ROAS targets consistently ? earn more

Clear growth path: Prove yourself ? become Head of Paid Acquisition

Direct access to founder: You'll shape strategy, not just execute

Budget to work with: We're ready to spend — you just need to make it profitable

Long-term role: We're building for 7 figures, not a quick project





This isn't for everyone.

If you want a "safe" job where you launch campaigns and wait for results — don't apply.

If you want to own paid acquisition for a fast-scaling brand and get rewarded for performance — keep reading.



How to apply:



First sentence MUST include "SCALE" or we delete your application

Share your best TikTok Ads case study (product, budget, ROAS, revenue — real numbers only)

Tell us which markets/countries you've worked in

List the e-commerce brands or niches you've scaled (fashion, beauty, home, etc.)

What's your testing strategy for new products? (Describe your process in 3-4 sentences)

Hours available per week + timezone



No generic applications. No made-up numbers. Show us proof.



Hiring process:



Top 10 candidates ? DISC test + typing test

10-minute intro call ? check: do you know your shit? can you communicate clearly?

Test task ? Launch a test campaign with provided creatives and report results

Follow-up call ? deeper strategy questions, ROAS targets, scaling approach

Hire within 3 days



Start date: ASAP

We're ready to spend. Are you ready to scale?

title: Sales Operations and CRM Support Consultant
description:
| ARE YOU THE DIAMOND WE ARE LOOKING FOR? |



Amazing role with high level benefits! | Immediate / ASAP Start



Are you bored with the same old jobs?



Do you know that if you were in the right role, one where your organisation skills, attention to detail, and your ability to think logically beyond a process could truly shine, you would THRIVE?



If this sounds like you, welcome. You might just be our person. Welcome to your Ultimate career move!



| ABOUT THE ROLE |



We are hiring for one role and looking for a diamond. You are rare, and so are we.



This Sales Operations and CRM Support Consultant will join our long term and well established Filipino team at My Ultimate Events, Australia’s leading events company for hens, bucks, and team celebrations.



This is a high volume, fast paced, admin heavy role, but it is not a rigid, robotic, box ticking position.



You will work as a pair with an Australian based consultant, where both of you are equal partners working toward shared outcomes while owning clearly defined responsibilities within a very busy pipeline.



Process matters here. CRM accuracy matters. Attention to detail is non negotiable.



But so does thinking.



You will be expected to understand the logic behind the process, not just follow it blindly. When a situation falls outside the standard path, you must be able to assess, think, and apply judgement, knowing when to adapt, when to escalate, and when to pause and ask the right question.



Speed of lead matters. Accuracy matters. Logic matters.



You will collaborate closely with your Australian partner, syncing daily, checking logic, flagging risks, and sense checking decisions. You will also work independently for large portions of the day, confidently managing your workload, making sound judgement calls, and keeping 
ntum moving without constant instruction.



This role sits at the intersection of structure and thinking. You must be comfortable operating within systems while also being able to step outside them when the situation genuinely requires it.



We are not filling a seat. We are searching for someone who is organised, sharp, thoughtful, adaptable, and capable of handling complexity in a consistently busy environment.



| CORE RESPONSIBILITIES |



-Work in a paired sales structure with an Australian Consultant, collaborating daily, aligning priorities, and supporting shared outcomes while owning your individual responsibilities within the pipeline.



-Manage a very busy workload with multiple conversations, systems, and tasks running at once.



-Maintain accurate, up to date CRM records at all times. Data accuracy, clean notes, and task tracking are essential.



-Follow established processes while understanding the logic behind them, and apply judgement when a scenario does not fit neatly into the standard workflow.



-Identify gaps, inconsistencies, or risks within client communication or bookings and think through the next best step, not just the next task.



-Respond to warm inbound leads and existing clients clearly, naturally, and professionally via written communication and occasional phone calls.



-Use templates and systems correctly, but adapt when clarity, tone, or logic requires a different approach.



-Know when to proceed, when to escalate, and when to pause and seek clarification.



-Work efficiently under pressure, maintaining quality and clear thinking during peak periods.



| WHO YOU ARE |



-Highly organised and detail oriented, with strong respect for process and accuracy.



-Equally capable of stepping outside a process to think logically and solve a problem when needed.



-Comfortable making judgement calls within defined boundaries.



-A strong written communicator who writes clearly, naturally, and with purpose.



-Calm, grounded, and reliable in busy environments with competing priorities.



-Confident working independently while collaborating closely with a partner.



-Intellectually curious and motivated to understand the “why” behind how things are done.



-Not someone who needs to be told every step, but also not someone who ignores structure.



If you are only comfortable following instructions without thinking, or if you prefer complete freedom without structure, this role will not be the right fit. We want someone who can do both.



| YOU MUST HAVE |



-Previous experience in an admin heavy, operations, sales support, or client coordination role that required judgement, not just task completion.



-Strong written English and high attention to detail across spelling, tone, logic, and data entry.



-Experience using CRM systems and working within defined workflows.



-Confidence speaking to clients by phone when required. All calls are warm or existing clients.



-Strong time management skills and the ability to prioritise under pressure.



-Experience using Microsoft Teams, Outlook, Word, OneDrive, and CRM systems.



-A quiet home office, fast wired internet, and a Windows PC (not Mac).



-Previous offshore experience with an Australian, US, or UK based company is an advantage.



| WORK HOURS |



Please only apply if you can consistently commit to these exact hours every week. These are essential to match your Australian sales partner and maintain operational rhythm.



Hours Brisbane Time



Monday to Friday 9am to 6pm Brisbane Time



Brisbane is UTC+10 and does not use daylight savings.



| SALARY AND BENEFITS |



-50,000 to 60,000 PHP per month depending on experience and skill.



-13th month pay.



-All Filipino public holidays fully paid and you do not come to work.



-15 days paid annual leave.



-Team huddles, training, mentorship, and operational support.



-Long term, full time role with a trusted Australian company that genuinely invests in its team.



-Amazing role with high level benefits.



| ABOUT US |



My Ultimate Events is Australia’s leading events organisation for hens, bucks, and corporate team events.



We have been creating unforgettable experiences for over 15 years and have proudly built a strong, loyal Filipino Australian team.



We value reliability, clarity, initiative, and intelligent execution. We expect people to think, not just follow.



You will not be a freelancer or a temp. You will be a valued part of a thriving company that values loyalty, excellence, and long term partnership.



| HOW TO APPLY |



Send your application directly to 
 to WOW us. We do not look at the Online Jobs inbox, so you must
 to be considered.



Please only apply if you genuinely enjoy roles that require both structure and thinking.



Include:



A personalised video telling us why you are the right fit for a role that combines process discipline with independent judgement.



A cover letter outlining your admin, CRM, or sales support experience and an example of when you had to think beyond a process to solve a problem. This must be written by you, not AI.



Your CV.



Confirmation of your PC specs, internet speed, and workspace setup.



If you are detail oriented, logical, adaptable, and ready for a long term role where both accuracy and thinking matter, we cannot wait to meet you.



| WELCOME TO YOUR ULTIMATE CAREER MOVE | We cannot wait to hear from you!!! |

title: Senior Paraplanner
description:
Company Overview 



BE SmartAdmin Services Pty Ltd (BESAS) is a bespoke Australian start-up company providing administrative, paraplanning, and bookkeeping services to a diverse range of clients, including financial planning, property, mortgage lending, and creative industries. While most of our team is based in the Philippines, our services are fully Australian-focused, and we pride ourselves on delivering tailored, high-quality solutions for each client. 



At BESAS, we value excellence in our work and in our interactions with clients, while also recognising that well-being and work-life balance matter. Our culture encourages innovation, collaboration, and results, and we are looking for someone who can make an impact, demonstrates a can-do attitude, and thrive in a dynamic start-up environment. 



Role Overview 



As a Senior Paraplanner, you will play a pivotal role in our paraplanning team. You will: 



-  Manage SOA/ROA/research/modelling requests from advisers and allocate them to the paraplanning team, while also personally preparing SOA/ROA/research/modelling work. 

-  Review the SOA/ROA/research/modelling prepared by the paraplanning team before submission to the adviser. 

-  Lead, coordinate, and support the paraplanning team to ensure advice documents meet adviser requirements and AFSL compliance standards. 

-  Learn to prepare UK Pension SOAs and confidently review them. 



This is a hands-on role requiring both active production and team guidance, with opportunities to make a tangible impact on our clients and team. 



Key Responsibilities 



Personal SOA Production 



-  Prepare a minimum of 1 SOA per day (approx. 4–5 hours) according to adviser instructions.  

-  Ensure all personal advice documents (SOA/ROA) meet AFSL compliance and adviser-specific preferences. 

-  Master UK Pension SOA preparation to support both production and review responsibilities. 



Paraplanning Team Support 



-  Support paraplanning operations and workflow management. 

-  Liaise directly with advisers (mainly via
) for SOA requests. 

-  Manage adviser expectations with clear updates on timelines, scope, and required information. 

-  Review SOA requests and adviser strategies for completeness, accuracy, and feasibility before assigning tasks. 

-  Coordinate the schedule and workload of part-time paraplanners, ensuring a 3–5 business day SOA turnaround. 

-  Provide guidance and upskilling to paraplanners on correct SOA clauses to include/exclude. 

-  Review and approve SOAs prepared by paraplanners, ensuring adherence to AFSL templates. 

-  Implement revision requests from the AFSL compliance team and provide constructive feedback to improve accuracy, compliance, and adviser satisfaction. 

-  Contribute to team growth through recruitment input, training, and process improvement initiatives. 



Quality Control & Adviser Liaison 



-  Coordinate with advisers and paraplanners for revisions as needed. 

-  Personally make final amendments to meet adviser deadlines. 

-  Be willing to conduct weekend SOA reviews in special cases (e.g., payroll cut-off deadlines) to ensure billing is included in the correct period. 



Who Could Be an Ideal Candidate 



You could be our ideal candidate if you are someone who: 



-  Has a strong background in paraplanning (5+ years) within the Australian financial planning industry. 

-  Can balance multiple advisers or practices while maintaining high accuracy and attention to detail. 

Is proactive, solutions-oriented, and has a can-do attitude. 

-  Thrives in a start-up environment where your contributions directly impact the team and clients. 

-  Values excellence in work and client service while maintaining work-life balance. 

-  Possesses leadership or mentoring experience, capable of guiding part-time paraplanners effectively. 

-  Is keen to learn and grow, including mastering complex advice types such as UK Pensions and LRBA. 

-  Is proficient in Xplan, including SuperSolver/WealthSolver, Risk Researcher, and XTOOLS+ Calm (retirement modelling). Familiarity with other tools (ProductRex, Omnium/OmniLife, RetireMap, Fin365) is a plus. 



Qualifications 



-  Minimum 5 years’ experience as a paraplanner in or for the Australian financial planning industry. 

-  Proven experience managing workflow or supporting multiple paraplanners. 

-  Strong knowledge of superannuation, personal insurance, retirement planning, and investment strategies. 

-  Strong written and verbal English communication skills. 

-  Ability to work autonomously while supporting and developing a small team. 

-  High proficiency in Microsoft Word and Excel. 

-  Exceptional attention to detail and ability to interpret technical information. 



Reporting 



This position reports directly to the Operations Manager. 



Home Office Requirements 



-  Power & Internet: Stable power supply and minimum 20 Mbps internet. 

-  Equipment: Computer/laptop with at least 8GB RAM and Microsoft Office installed. 

-  Environment: Quiet home office suitable for client calls and tea
etings. 



Working Hours 



-  Schedule: 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM, Monday to Friday (Philippine Standard Time), including 1-hour unpaid lunch. 

-  Time Tracking: Use Clockify to track all work hours (excluding lunch) with task-level granularity. 

-  Breaks: Short tea breaks up to 15 minutes (max. 2/day) with supervisor notification. 



Compensation & Benefits 



Rates & Salary 



-  PHP 700/hour – Premium billable work (SOA/ROA prep, research, adviser communication). 

-  PHP 300/hour – Base rate for non-billable time (idle periods, tea breaks, etc.). 

-  Monthly salary range: ?107,467 (80% billable) – ?121,333 (100% billable). 

-  Independent contractor arrangement, inclusive of 13th month and government contributions (SSS, PhilHealth, Pag-IBIG). 



Leave & Incentives 



-  6-month probation: Hourly rate may be reviewed based on performance. 

-  1st anniversary: 10 workdays of paid leave annually, prorated in the first year. 

-  Mandatory 10-day Christmas break (dates advised annually). 

-  Performance bonuses are discretionary, based on quality, consistency, and turnaround expectations.

title: Video Editor for YouTube Channel Full-time
description:
We are currently hiring a skilled and experienced video editor to join our team long-term and full-time. We are a finance-focused channel with 50K+ subscribers looking for an editor who can execute high-level documentary storytelling similar to Johnny Harris, Cleo Abrams, and Ryan Trahan.



Responsibilities:



- Edit high-retention video content, including long-form financial documentaries, shorts, and podcasts.

- Use Adobe Premiere Pro or After Effects to create a cinematic, texture-heavy, and data-driven visual style.

- Manage multiple projects and meet tight deadlines for a consistent upload schedule.

- Stay up-to-date with the latest YouTube trends, especially in the "Edutainment" and Finance niche.

- Apply advanced animation and motion graphics to make complex investing topics easy to understand.



The qualifications we are seeking include:



- A proven track record as a video editor with a strong portfolio of documentary-style YouTube projects.

- Exceptional attention to detail and a "director’s eye" for pacing and storytelling.

- Strong communication and collaboration skills in English.

- Fast internet connection for handling large 4K files.

- Self-reliance and the ability to take a script and transform it into a visual masterpiece independently.



To Apply:



As part of your application, please send over ONE video you’re most proud of, we will only watch the first 30 seconds, so make sure it shows off your best storytelling and motion graphics!



Our goal is to learn, grow, and succeed together, we want to work with you for years, not months!

title: Fiction Market Research & Amazon Publishing Intern
description:
Catalyst Brand Strategy | Publishing Division

 Remote | Part-Time Contractor



The Role



We are hiring a Fiction Market Research & Amazon KDP (Kindle Direct Publishing) Intern to support structured Kindle launches and relaunches.



 This is a junior publishing research position designed for someone who wants to understand how books succeed commercially on Amazon.



This role is ideal for someone who:



• Loves fiction and genuinely gets excited about story structure

 • Thinks analytically and notices patterns

 • Enjoys spreadsheets and structured research

 • Wants to learn marketplace psychology and algorithm behavior

 • Is comfortable working in data-driven environments



This role is research-led and data-informed.



 Creative writing is not the primary focus.



You will support the groundwork behind:



• Fiction keyword research

 • Category positioning

 • Competitor intelligence

 • Title and description positioning research

 • Cover trend research

 • ARC tracking support

 • Metadata documentation



You will not:



• Make final publishing decisions

 • Access author publishing accounts

 • Immediately manage advertising budgets



Training, templates, and weekly coaching are provided.



What Makes This Role Different



You will be trained in:



• Kindlepreneur-aligned fiction keyword research systems

 • Amazon A–Z incognito research methodology

 • Reverse ASIN competitor extraction

 • Sales validation using Amazon Best Seller Rank

 • Competition scoring and keyword viability assessment

 • Conversion-aware packaging alignment

 • Amazon review compliance guidelines

 • Advertising policy fundamentals



You will learn how Amazon’s algorithm expands books based on keyword fit and conversion performance, and how research influences title, cover, and description decisions.



Hours & Compensation



• 10 to 20 hours per week

 • $4 to $6 USD per hour depending on experience

 • Remote contractor role

 • 1 active title at a time during first 60 days

 • Weekly check-in with Publishing Strategist



Performance review at 90 days with potential rate adjustment based on competency, accuracy, and reliability.



Growth Opportunity



This role includes a structured pathway into Amazon Ads support and eventual campaign management for high performers.



After demonstrating strong research competency, you may:



• Assist with campaign setup

 • Upload and organize keyword targeting

 • Monitor weekly ad metrics

 • Recommend keyword refinements



High performers may eventually manage small Amazon Ads budgets.



Commission eligibility begins only after formal transition into campaign management.



Commission structure:



• 3% to 5% of net profit generated from Amazon Ads campaigns directly managed

Net profit is calculated after ad spend and platform fees.

Training is provided before any advertising responsibility is assigned.



What We’re Looking For



Required:



• Strong written English

 • Comfortable using Google Sheets or Excel

 • High attention to detail

 • Analytical thinker

 • Reliable internet connection

 • Genuinely interested in fiction publishing



Preferred:



• Familiarity with Kindlepreneur methodology

 • Experience using Publisher Rocket

 • Basic understanding of Amazon Best Seller Rank

 • Interest in crime and thriller genres

 • Ability to communicate progress clearly and consistently



Application Requirements



Please submit:



• Your favorite fiction genre and why

 • One bestselling fiction book and what drives its commercial appeal

 • A sample spreadsheet, if available

 • Your weekly availability

 • Your hourly rate

 • Confirmation of reliable internet access





Shortlisted candidates will complete a paid research task.
salary: $4 to $6 USD per hour depending on exper

title: Medical Virtual Assistant for Patient Scheduling & Coordination (US Acupuncture Clinic)
description:
I am a licensed acupuncturist and clinic owner based in the United States. I run a boutique, patient-centered, private-pay acupuncture and Chinese medicine clinic and am seeking a detail-oriented Medical Virtual Assistant to support patient coordination, scheduling, and daily clinic operations.



This is a high-responsibility, patient-facing role. You will function as a remote clinic coordinator and my right hand in managing communication, scheduling accuracy, and time-sensitive tasks. I am a solo practitioner, so efficiency and reliability are extremely important. You will be required to stay responsive during US business hours, but daily task volume is low. Accuracy and responsiveness are more important than speed or constant activity.



You will help keep the clinic running smoothly from the operational side while I focus on treating patients in person. This role requires proactive communication, strong attention to detail, and the ability to stay organized within a dynamic, real-time schedule.



This is not a passive role where you wait for tasks. Instead, you will be expected to stay responsive, anticipate needs, follow structured workflows, and help maintain a high level of professionalism and efficiency in all patient interactions.

This is also NOT a high-volume call center role.

We provide high-touch, premium care and value accuracy, warmth, and professionalism in all patient communication.



You will be working directly with me (the doctor), so clear communication, reliability, and attention to detail are very important at all times.



This role starts as a trial (2 weeks) with potential for long-term part-time work if it’s a good fit.



CORE RESPONSIBILITIES



-Respond to new patient inquiries that is time sensitive (text/email/call)

-Answer incoming calls from new and existing patients using OpenPhone (cloud phone system)

-Schedule appointments accurately within new inquiry timeframe (booking + checking completeness)

-Collect patient information (name, phone,
, reason for visit)

-Ensure intake forms are completed within required timeframe

-Send appointment confirmations and reminders

-Develop and follow structured workflow templates provided

-Create superbills with information provided

-Flag incomplete bookings or issues immediately

-Maintain organized patient communication records

-HIPAA certified 



What This Role Is NOT

-Not social media management

-Not content creation

-Not sales calls

-Not medical advice (strictly coordination only)

-This is a patient coordination and scheduling role for a healthcare clinic.



Required Skills (Please Do NOT Apply Without These)

-Excellent written and conversational English

-Strong attention to detail (VERY important)

-Experience with scheduling or appointment booking

-Ability to develop and follow workflows and templates exactly

-Professional and warm communication style

-Strong internet connection

-Experience working with medical, wellness, or healthcare clinics

-Experience with EHR or scheduling systems (JaneApp, etc.)

-Patient coordinator or medical VA experience

-Organized and reliable, always a step ahead of me



Screening Questions (REQUIRED)



Please answer the following:

-Do you have experience handling patient scheduling or appointment booking? Describe briefly.

-How do you make sure bookings are complete and accurate?

-Have you worked with a medical, wellness, or healthcare clinic before?

-Can you repeat directions back and execute without issue?

-Can you work weekdays and online during US EST business hours checking inbox 2-3 times, and check inbox and book new patients during weekends (asynchronous hours)?

-What would you do if you were unsure how to book a patient correctly?

-Confirm your internet speed and typical working hours (in your time zone)

-Are you okay with a part time range of 15-20 hours/week starting and increasing based on workload

Applications without answers to these questions will not be considered.

Comfortable asking clarification questions when unsure.



Please start your application with the phrase:

“Patient care requires accuracy.”

title: Real Estate Photography Admin
description:
We are a professional real estate media company delivering high-quality photography, video, iGUIDE tours, and floor plans to agents and brokerages. We are hiring a highly organized, detail-driven administrative tea
mber to manage the backend production workflow from booking to final delivery.



This is an operations-focused role. You will be responsible for ensuring every project moves efficiently through editing, quality control, and client delivery without errors.



Core Responsibilities



Editing Workflow Management

 • Upload raw photo files to our editing software (Fotello)

 • Perform quality control directly within the editing platform, ensuring:

 • Proper exposure and color balance

 • Straight vertical lines

 • Clean window pulls

 • Complete room coverage

 • Communicate revision requests to editors when necessary



File Organization & Delivery

 • Download finalized images from the editing software

 • Upload completed media to our delivery system

 • Ensure correct file naming and folder structure and order the photos

 • Deliver completed galleries to clients on time

 • Provide iGUIDE links and supporting media as required



Floor Plans & iGUIDE Processing

 • Process and manage floor plans through the iGUIDE system

 • Verify floor plan accuracy before client delivery

 • Ensure iGUIDE tours are uploaded, functional, and complete

 • Deliver finalized iGUIDE assets to clients



Booking & Scheduling

 • Schedule shoots through Aryeo

 • Confirm property details, access instructions, and client notes

 • Send booking confirmations and reminders

 • Manage calendar adjustments and communicate changes clearly



Workflow Tracking & Systems

 • Maintain accurate project tracking inside Notion

 • Monitor each project from booking ? editing ? QC ? delivery

 • Identify inefficiencies and suggest process improvements

 • Ensure deadlines are consistently met



?



Tools We Use

 • iGUIDE (floor plans & virtual tours)

 • Aryeo (scheduling & operations)

 • Dropbox (file management & delivery)

 • Notion (workflow tracking & internal organization)

 • Fotello (AI photo editing software platform (QC + revisions)



?



Requirements

 • Strong organizational and operational skills

 • High attention to visual detail

 • Experience managing creative production workflows (preferred)

 • Comfortable learning and operating multiple software platforms

 • Clear, professional written communication

 • Ability to manage multiple active projects simultaneously

 • Reliable and deadline-oriented



Experience in real estate media, photography operations, or production coordination is strongly preferred.



?



Ideal Candidate

 • Systems-driven and highly structured

 • Proactive in catching mistakes before client delivery

 • Calm under schedule changes

 • Comfortable working independently in a remote environment

 • Takes ownership of quality and process consistency



?



Compensation



Full-time salary based on experience. Long-term opportunity within a growing real estate media company.



?



How to Apply



Please include:

 1. A brief description of your operations or admin experience

 2. Any experience with editing workflow management or quality control

 3. Experience using Dropbox, Notion, Aereo, or iGUIDE (if applicable)

 4. Your availability and time zone

 5. A short note explaining why you would be a strong fit for this role



Only applicants who follow the instructions above will be considered.

title: Personnal Stylist
description:
Personal Stylist – Trend-Focused & Budget-Conscious

Position Title:

Personal Stylist (Trending Fashion & Affordable Luxury Looks)

Position Summary:

We are seeking a fashion-forward Personal Stylist who specializes in curating trendy, polished looks while maintaining a smart budget. This stylist will source stylish, affordable outfits for vacations, special events, professional appearances, and everyday elevated wear.

The ideal candidate understands current fashion trends, body types, color theory, and how to create high-end aesthetics at affordable price points.

 

Key Responsibilities

• Curate complete outfits for:

o Vacation looks (resort, cruise, tropical, city trips)

o Formal events (weddings, galas, birthdays)

o Business and networking events

o Casual-chic everyday wear

• Shop both online and in-store for budget-friendly fashion

• Stay updated on current fashion trends and seasonal collections

• Source affordable alternatives to luxury designer pieces

• Create look books and mood boards for clients

• Coordinate accessories, shoes, handbags, and statement pieces

• Assist with wardrobe edits and closet organization

• Provide body-type and color-based styling recommendations

• Work within client budgets without sacrificing style

• Track sales, discount codes, and fashion deals

 

Required Skills & Qualifications

• Strong knowledge of current fashion trends

• Ability to style high-end looks on a realistic budget

• Excellent eye for color coordination and fit

• Experience with online retailers (Zara, H&M, Mango, ASOS, Amazon fashion, etc.)

• Familiarity with resale platforms (Poshmark, Shein alternatives, Fashion Nova, etc.)

• Knowledge of tailoring basics

• Strong communication skills

• Experience creating digital look books (Canva, Pinterest, etc.)

• Social media savvy (Instagram/TikTok fashion trends preferred)

 

Preferred Experience

• 1–3 years styling experience

• Portfolio of styled looks

• Experience styling for:

o Vacation wardrobes

o Professional women

o Special events

• Understanding of body positivity and inclusive sizing

 

Budget-Smart Shopping Expertise Should Include:

• Finding designer-inspired pieces under $100

• Mixing high and low fashion

• Identifying quality fabrics at affordable retailers

• Using discount codes, flash sales, and clearance sourcing

• Thrift + boutique sourcing when appropriate

 

If You Want a Shorter Version for Posting:

We are seeking a trend-savvy Personal Stylist who can curate fashionable, vacation-ready and event-ready looks on a smart budget. Must have a strong eye for detail, knowledge of trending styles, and ability to source affordable yet elevated outfits. Experience creating look books and styling complete outfits required.

 

If you’d like, I can also create:

• A contract template for hiring a stylist

• A personal stylist service description for your own business

• A budget-friendly vacation capsule wardrobe guide

• A checklist for event styling

• Or a luxury-looking but affordable vacation packing list ?

Just tell me which direction you want to go.

title: GoHighLevel Developer & Automation Specialist
description:
READ THIS ENTIRE POST BEFORE APPLYING — TEMPLATED OR AI-GENERATED APPLICATIONS WILL BE DECLINED IMMEDIATELY



POSITION: GoHighLevel Developer & Automation Specialist

Company: Automize REI

Pay: Monthly Recurring (Long-Term Role)

Platform: GoHighLevel (GHL)

Industry Focus: Real Estate Investing (Wholesaling, Flipping, Rentals)



ABOUT US



Automize REI is an AI-powered real estate investment CRM and automation platform built on GoHighLevel. We serve wholesalers, flippers, and rental property investors with a fully built-out system that includes AI voice integrations (Assistible.ai), AI SMS follow-ups, lead data integrations, disposition automations, and more. We have paying customers, a live WordPress website, and we are actively scaling into new industries beyond real estate. We are operational and growing.



WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING



This is a hands-on, backend development and operations role. Your responsibilities will include:



- Building, updating, and maintaining GHL automations, workflows, pipelines, custom fields, and sub-accounts

- Setting up and managing A2P 10DLC registration and compliance for new clients, ensuring SMS campaigns are properly configured and compliant

- Onboarding new clients onto the platform — walking them through setup, configurations, and getting them fully operational

- Providing ongoing support to existing users through calls, troubleshooting, and follow-up

- Collecting user feedback and translating it into actionable automation updates and platform improvements

- Researching and implementing new AI tools — including voice, SMS, and conversational AI — to continuously improve our system

- Writing and refining AI prompts for lead qualification, follow-up sequences, and disposition bots — must understand real prompt engineering, not copy-paste from ChatGPT

- Building and improving disposition bots that understand seller motivation, seller psychology, and real estate deal flow

- Researching cost-saving opportunities across SMS, phone, and data usage within GHL

- Updating UI/UX elements within GHL sub-accounts and snapshot configurations to improve user experience

- Helping curate and improve our WordPress website, including SEO and design updates

- Creating visual workflow diagrams and documentation of automations

- Staying ahead of GHL platform updates and proactively recommending improvements

- Supporting our data provider integration for automated lead delivery and property research within GHL





WHO THIS IS FOR



This role is for you if:



- You have hands-on GHL development experience — not theoretical, not surface-level

- You understand real estate investing: wholesaling, seller motivation, ARV, deal disposition, skip tracing, and lead follow-up

- You have experience with A2P 10DLC registration, SMS compliance, and carrier vetting

- You know how to write and engineer AI prompts from scratch — not copy-paste

- You have built disposition bots, lead qualification bots, or AI follow-up sequences

- You are comfortable on calls with clients and can communicate clearly and professionally in English

- You can onboard new users, explain complex systems simply, and provide reliable support

- You can do deep research independently and bring back concrete recommendations

- You take initiative and do not need to be micromanaged



This role is NOT for you if:



- You have never worked in real estate or with a real estate CRM

- Your GHL experience is limited to basic funnels or simple
 automations

- You have no experience with A2P compliance or SMS campaign setup

- You cannot write a real AI prompt and rely on generic ChatGPT outputs

- Your English communication skills are not strong — this role requires clear, professional written and spoken English

- You submit a copy-paste application — it will be declined without review



TRIAL PERIOD



The first phase of this engagement will be a paid trial to assess fit, communication quality, work output, and ability to hit the ground running. If you perform well, this becomes a long-term monthly recurring role.



HOW TO APPLY — REQUIRED QUESTIONS



Do NOT send a generic cover letter. Do NOT use ChatGPT to write your application. I will know, and your application will be declined immediately.



Instead, answer all of the following questions in your own words, thoroughly and specifically:



1. Why do you want this specific job? Not a generic answer — explain why Automize REI and this type of work interests you personally.



2. Describe your real estate experience. Have you worked with wholesalers, flippers, or investors? Do you understand seller motivation, disposition, ARV, or the acquisition-to-close process? Be specific.



3. Describe your GoHighLevel experience in detail. How many clients or accounts have you built in GHL? What types of automations have you built? Have you worked with sub-accounts, snapshots, custom fields, or pipelines? Give real examples.



4. What is your experience with A2P 10DLC registration and SMS compliance? Have you set up campaigns for clients? What challenges have you run into and how did you resolve them?



5. What is your experience with AI tools and prompt engineering? What AI platforms have you integrated into GHL or used for real estate? Give a specific example of a prompt you built from scratch and what it was designed to do.



6. Have you built any chatbots, disposition bots, or AI follow-up sequences? Describe the logic and flow of one you have built.



7. What is your experience with client onboarding and support? How do you handle a client who is frustrated or confused during setup?



8. What is your experience with WordPress, web design, or SEO?



PORTFOLIO REQUIREMENT



You MUST attach screenshots of GHL automations or workflows you have personally built. These must be actual screenshots from inside GoHighLevel — no planning documents, no Notion pages, no Loom previews. Real screenshots only. I will review every one of them.



If you have read this far and you are serious — we want to hear from you. This is a growing platform with real customers, real traction, and a real opportunity to be part of building something long-term. High-caliber applicants only.

title: Digital Media Buyer
description:
Digital Media Buyer Job Description



Signalytics is seeking a results-driven and analytical Digital Media Buyer to join our Amazon- managed services team. This role  is responsible for developing, executing, and optimizing advertising strategies using Amazon’s Demand Side Platform (DSP) and external media platforms. The ideal candidate has hands-on experience in Amazon DSP, digital advertising, and leveraging media buying strategies to drive high-quality traffic to Amazon product listings.



Key Responsibilities:

Media Strategy Development & Execution:

• Develop and implement data-driven advertising strategies on and off Amazon using DSP and other media platforms.

• Plan and execute targeted media campaigns across display, video, and audio channels.

• Utilize external platforms (e.g.,
) to redirect traffic to Amazon product listings.

• Monitor trends and continuously optimize campaigns for performance and ROI.



Campaign Management & Optimization:

• Create, manage, and monitor ad campaigns on Amazon DSP and other digital advertising platforms.

• Manage advertising budgets effectively, ensuring maximum efficiency and performance.

• Analyze campaign performance before, during, and after execution, providing actionable insights and recommendations.

• Apply customer buying behavior insights to refine targeting and messaging strategies.



Collaboration & Communication:

• Work closely with the Creative team for copywriting and visual assets to support campaign objectives.

• Collaborate with Amazon Specialists to ensure product listings are optimized for incoming traffic.

• Coordinate cross-functional efforts to align advertising with broader marketing and promotional goals.



Data Analysis & Reporting:

• Analyze advertising and marketplace data to evaluate campaign performance and identify opportunities for improvement.

• Track and report on key metrics, including click-through rates (CTR), conversion rates, and return on ad spend (ROAS).

• Present campaign insights and recommendations clearly to stakeholders and internal teams.



Qualifications & Skills:

• Minimum of 2 years of experience in digital media buying or advertising.

• Preferably with experience Amazon Demand Side Platform (DSP) but not required.

• Experience with
 Ads, Google Ads and Media Buying

• Effective communicator with the ability to work cross-functionally.

• Proficient in Microsoft Office and Google Workspace tools.

What We Offer:

• Team-building events and a supportive work environment.

title: CRO Website Designer (Healthcare)
description:
Overview



We are a U.S.-based company.



Our site is already functional — we need an expert who can turn it into a high-performing intake and consultation booking engine while keeping the existing concepts of a calm, family-centered brand feel and making it clean and performant. This is not a full rebrand. 



We are looking for a top-tier conversion designer, not a general web freelancer.



Project Goal



Redesign and optimize our website to increase:



-Consultation bookings

-Insurance inquiry form submissions

-Trust and engagement

-Mobile conversion rate



This role is for someone who understands how clients choose healthcare providers and how healthcare trust signals drive action.



What You’ll Be Doing



You will lead a conversion refresh of our website, including:



-Rewriting and restructuring the homepage for clarity + action

-Designing a stronger above-the-fold hero section with clear CTAs

-Adding trust elements (testimonials, credentials, insurance acceptance)

-Building a simple intake flow (“Free Consult ? Insurance Verify ? Start Therapy”)

-Build dedicated landing pages for different campaigns

-Improving mobile-first conversion (sticky call/book buttons)

-Creating a modern but calm healthcare aesthetic that matches our current vibe

-Ensuring every page drives toward a clear next step



Required Experience (Do Not Apply Without These)



To apply, you must have:



? Proven experience designing lead-gen websites that convert

? Experience in healthcare, therapy, pediatrics, or similar high-trust services

? Strong understanding of UX psychology and decision-making

? Ability to improve copy + layout (not just visuals)

? Portfolio showing measurable results (conversion lifts, booking increases, etc.)

? Experience with modern landing page systems (Webflow, Framer, LandingSite, Wix Studio, etc.)



This Role Is NOT For You If…



-You only do “pretty design” without a conversion strategy

-You rely on templates with generic stock layouts

-You have no experience with service-based or healthcare businesses

-You cannot explain how your work increases leads

-You don’t understand trust-building for parents



What a Successful Outcome Looks Like



Within 30 days, our site should feel like:



-A premium, trusted provider

-Clear insurance-friendly intake process

-Parents immediately trust us and know what to do next

-Higher consultation bookings and inbound calls

-Stronger emotional connection and credibility



To Apply (Filter Question — Required)

Include the following in your application:



-A link to 2–3 relevant conversion-based projects



Your answer to:

-What are the top 3 changes you would make to a booking website/landing page to increase parent consultation bookings?

-Any measurable results you’ve achieved (conversion %, leads, bookings, etc.)



Applications without these will not be reviewed.

title: Call Center Transfer Agent
description:
JOB OVERVIEW

As a Transfer Agent, you will play a crucial role in facilitating outbound phone sales and transferring customers to the appropriate departments to meet their specific needs. We are looking for a candidate with exceptional English language skills, previous outbound phone sales experience, and a background in transfer agent responsibilities.



Responsibilities:

Conduct outbound phone sales calls to prospective customers, verify information and qualify client

Engage customers in a courteous and friendly manner, actively listening to their inquiries and requirements.

Determine the customers' needs and identify the most suitable department for transferring the call.

Efficiently transfer calls to the designated department or representative while ensuring seamless communication.

Maintain accurate records of transferred calls and any relevant customer information.

Collaborate effectively with tea
mbers to optimize the call center's overall performance and customer satisfaction.

Handle a high volume of calls in a fast-paced environment while adhering to quality and efficiency standards.

Keep up-to-date with product/service knowledge and stay informed about company promotions and offers.

Utilize effective sales techniques to increase conversion rates and achieve individual and team targets.

Provide feedback and suggestions for process improvement to enhance overall call center efficiency.



Requirements:

Exceptional English language skills, both verbal and written, to communicate effectively with English-speaking customers.

Proven experience in outbound phone sales, demonstrating the ability to close deals successfully.

Previous experience as a Transfer Agent or in a similar role, with a track record of efficiently transferring calls to the appropriate departments.

Availability to work full-time on an overnight shift, from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM PST (Pacific Standard Time).

Strong organizational skills and the ability to manage time effectively in a high-pressure environment.

Tech-savvy and proficient in using call center software and CRM systems.

A proactive and adaptable attitude, willing to take on challenges and meet targets consistently.

Ability to submit examples of prior work, including recordings of voice for assessment purposes

Immediate availability to start working with our team.

title: Real Estate Project Coordinator (Housing Finance & Funding focus)
description:
Role Overview:

We are seeking a high-level Virtual Assistant to manage the lifecycle of affordable housing funding applications. You will be responsible for extracting requirements from complex government/private NOFAs (Notices of Funding Availability), maintaining strict deadline calendars, and performing data entry in complex Excel-based pro-formas including unit mixes and capital stacks.



Key Responsibilities:

Compliance Review: Read through 50+ page funding manuals to extract checklist items, formatting rules, and submission deadlines.



Excel Management: Accurately input unit counts, Area Median Income (AMI) levels, and financial sources (Debt, Equity, Grants) into multi-tab workbooks.



Document Coordination: Manage "Team Narrative" files, ensuring resumes, bios, and corporate entity documents are updated and correctly formatted for each specific application.



Deadline Management: Send daily/weekly status reports to the Principal regarding upcoming "hard" and "soft" deadlines.



Required Qualifications:

Advanced Excel: Ability to navigate linked workbooks and troubleshoot formula errors.



Financial Literacy: Fundamental understanding of "Sources and Uses" and the difference between Debt (loans) and Equity (investor capital).



Analytical Writing: Ability to take existing project descriptions and "massage" them to fit specific page or word counts.



****How to Apply (Please Read Carefully)****

To be considered for this role, your application must include the following three items. Failure to follow these specific instructions will result in an immediate disqualification.



Subject Line: Change the subject line of your application to: [Your Name] | Housing Strategy VA | [Your Favorite City in the Philippines]



The "Logic Check" Answer: In the first paragraph of your cover letter, please answer this specific question: "If a housing project has a Total Development Cost (TDC) of $5,000,000 and the Senior Loan is $3,500,000, how much Equity Injection is required to balance the Sources and Uses (assuming no other grants)?"



The "Acronym" Sentence: Tell me in one sentence if you have ever worked with AMI (Area Median Income) or LIHTC calculations before. If you haven't, simply state: "I am familiar with complex Excel workbooks and am ready to learn the AMI framework."

title: Personal Cook/Assistant
description:
Job title Personal Household Cook (Personal Chef + 2x a day, Dog Walking)

Employment Type Full Time

Location BGC

Client Nationality American

Stay in/ out Stay Out

But staff quarters will be provided for rest breaks (shower, toilet, rest area)

Schedule Monday - Saturday

8am Start, to have 9 am Breakfast ready 6 pm Departure

~Occasional requirement to work overtime if there are guests coming over on a Sat or Sun evening.

Salary TBD

Job Description How you’ll make an impact

We are hiring a reliable and experienced Personal Household Cook (Personal Chef) to

prepare healthy, Western-style meals and support daily household errands related to food

and basic supplies. This role is best for someone who enjoys cooking nutritious meals

consistently, is organized with shopping and ingredients, and is comfortable caring for a

small dog.

Key Responsibilities:

Healthy Meal Preparation (Western-Style)?  Prepare healthy Western-style meals using techniques such as steaming, air frying,

oven baking, grilling, and light sautéing.

Prepare daily meals with consistency and good portioning

Maintain freshness and proper food storage (labeling and organizing leftovers when

helpful).

Meal Planning and Customization

Build on an existing meal plan while suggesting new healthy recipes.

Coordinate with the client to align meals with dietary preferences and any

restrictions.

Grocery Shopping and Household Shopping Errands

Purchase groceries and high-quality ingredients (fresh produce, proteins,

health-conscious options).

Run misc shopping errands as requested (basic household items, quick pickups,

etc.).

Track what’s running low and keep a simple running list for restocking.



Meal Presentation

Ensure meals are clean, appealing, and served properly.

Kitchen Cleanliness and Organization (Only Cleaning Scope)

Keep the kitchen clean and organized during and after cooking.

Wash dishes used for cooking, wipe counters, clean cooking surfaces, and maintain

basic organization of the pantry/fridge related to meal prep.

Dog Walking and Care

Walk a small poodle twice daily (morning and afternoon).

When the employer travels, you will be paid your full rate to care for the dog.



Key Requirements:

Fluent in English (Non-Negotiable): Must be fluent in spoken and written English.

Healthy Western Cooking Experience: Proven experience in preparing healthy

Western dishes (salads, baked dishes, steamed meals, air-fried meals, grilled items,

etc.).

Strong Meal Planning Ability: Can propose meal ideas, rotate meals, and keep Food choices healthy and varied.

title: QA Automation Engineer (Cypress or Similar)
description:
Job Title: QA Automation Engineer (Remote – Philippines)

Location: Remote – Philippines

Company: EETech



About EETech



EETech is a dynamic technology company committed to delivering innovative digital commerce solutions. Our global team collaborates to create cutting-edge platforms that drive success for our clients. We value creativity, technical excellence, and a forward-thinking approach to solving complex challenges.





Job Overview

EETech is looking for a skilled QA Automation Engineer to ensure our software products are robust, efficient, and ready for production. In this remote role, you will design and develop automated test scripts, integrate testing frameworks into our CI/CD pipelines, and work collaboratively with cross-functional teams to improve product quality. This position is ideal for a proactive engineer who is passionate about leveraging automation to drive continuous improvement in quality assurance.





Key Responsibilities

• Test Automation Development:

o Design, develop, and maintain automated test scripts for web and mobile applications.

o Implement automated testing frameworks and integrate them with existing CI/CD pipelines.



• Quality Assurance & Continuous Improvement:

o Collaborate with development and product teams to identify test requirements and ensure comprehensive test

coverage.

o Analyze test results, track issues, and work with the team to resolve defects promptly.



• Framework & Tool Enhancement:

o Evaluate and implement new automation tools and best practices to enhance testing efficiency and accuracy.

o Maintain and update existing test suites in response to new feature developments or changes.



• Documentation & Reporting:

o Create detailed test plans, test cases, and technical documentation to support automation efforts.

o Provide clear, concise reports on test outcomes, quality metrics, and areas for improvement.



• Collaboration & Agile Practices:

o Actively participate in agile ceremonies, including daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives.

o Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure timely delivery of high-quality software solutions.





Qualifications

• Technical Skills:

o Proficiency in programming languages such as JavaScript, Python, or Java.

o Strong experience with test automation frameworks (e.g., Selenium, Cypress, Appium).

o Familiarity with CI/CD tools and processes (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD).



• Experience:

o Proven track record in automating test cases for web and mobile applications.

o Experience in a remote work environment with effective communication and time management skills.



• Soft Skills:

o Excellent analytical and problem-solving abilities with keen attention to detail.

o Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with diverse teams.



• Preferred Qualifications:

o Experience with performance and load testing tools is a plus.

o Knowledge of agile development methodologies and continuous testing practices.





What We Offer

• Remote Work Flexibility:

o Enjoy the freedom to work from anywhere in the Philippines while collaborating with a global team.

• Collaborative Environment:

o Be part of an innovative, team-oriented culture that values technical excellence and continuous improvement.

title: Social Media Manager
description:
SUMMARY



We are seeking a Social Media Manager who will be responsible for creating content and developing strategies that drive creator growth and brand impact. This role combines creativity with data-driven decision-making, crafting engaging content, optimizing influencer collaborations, and supporting creators to grow their audience and influence.

title: Remote Copywriter for Short Form Content (Philippines Time Zone)
description:
We are looking for a dependable copywriter who is fluent in English, has a background in marketing, is familiar with social media content, and is seeking a remote role Monday through Saturday. You will be trained to rewrite high performing viral Instagram Reels into scripts tailored for our agency’s clients.



Availability



This role requires availability Monday through Saturday.



Ideally between 9:30 AM and 5:30 PM Philippines time, though later working hours can be arranged for candidates who prefer an evening schedule.



Requirements



- Fluent in English, mandatory requirement

- Experience in marketing or copywriting, mandatory requirement

- Very responsive and reliable on WhatsApp

- Able to learn quickly and follow systems

- Comfortable using tools such as Notion, Claude, ChatGPT, and Google Workspace

- Able to work independently using provided training and documentation



Compensation



- The position begins with a paid training period lasting approximately 2 to 4 weeks

- During training, you will be paid per short form script at a starting rate of 130 PHP per script

- As your speed and quality improve, pay may increase up to 290 PHP per script

- For trainees, a script may take up to 1 hour to complete

- Experienced copywriters typically complete a script in 15 to 30 minutes

- Over time, if we work well together, compensation may transition to a fixed monthly salary



The exact rate progression will be discussed once training is completed.



Marketing Knowledge Expectation



Applicants should be familiar with common marketing and social media concepts such as pain points, ideal client profile (ICP), target audience, hooks, calls to action (CTA), value proposition, engagement tactics, and conversion focused content.



How to Apply



To apply, please reply with the following information:



1. Your WhatsApp number

2. Confirmation that you are available during the listed time windows

3. Your background in marketing and social media

4. The smartphone model you use

5. The laptop model you use

6. A Google Drive link containing a screenshot of your internet speed test results. Make sure the link is set to “Anyone with the link.”



Thank you for your interest. We will review applications and contact shortlisted candidates.

title: Marketing Content Creator (AI-Powered) — Remote | $1,000–$2,000/month USD

What you'll actually do day-to-day:

Write ad scripts and UGC-style hooks for Meta campaigns. Build
 sequences for trial users, leads, and re-engagement. Create lead magnets and content offers that drive signups. Ghost-write LinkedIn and Instagram content on behalf of marketing influencers. Use Apify to scrape and build targeted
 lists for outbound campaigns. Research what's working in the market and adapt it for AdFlux campaigns.



You're the right person if:

You use AI tools every day and know how to get great output, not just first drafts. You can switch tone — from punchy ad copy to conversational
 to authentic influencer voice. You move fast and don't wait for perfect. You've written copy that has actually run as an ad,
, or social post (portfolio required). You're comfortable with scraping tools or willing to learn them fast. Your English writing is clean, natural, and human-sounding.



We don't care about:

Your degree. How many years of "experience" you have on paper. Whether you've worked at a big agency. If your work is good and you're fast, that's all that matters.



Tools we use and expect you to know (or learn fast):

ChatGPT / Claude, Apify, Meta Ads Library, Google Docs, Notion. Bonus if you've used any AI video or creative tools before.



How this works:

We run a simple 2-step process so we're not wasting anyone's time.

Step 1 — Fill out a short application form (2 minutes, link below). Step 2 — Top applicants will be sent a short async video screen (record on your own time, no scheduling). Step 3 — Final candidates do a 30-minute live skills test with real tasks, real tools, no trick questions.

We move fast. If you apply and you're a fit, you'll hear back within 48 hours.

title: Strategic Sales Partner
description:
* ** Please apply for this position using the following URL: 
 ***



ABOUT KAITERRA:

We spend 90% of our time indoors, where air quality directly impacts our health, well-being, and overall comfort.

At Kaiterra, we believe our buildings should not only be safe and healthy but also enhance the quality of life for those inside them. That’s why we create innovative environmental monitoring devices and intelligent software analytics, combined with world-class professional consultation services, to help leading companies worldwide transform their built environments.

Our clients include some of the world’s most respected companies—Microsoft, LinkedIn, Google, and Apple, to name a few. They come to us for solutions to complex challenges in their environments, and we work with them to create healthier, safer, and smarter spaces.

If you’re looking to join a purpose-driven organization making a tangible impact on the human experience, Kaiterra could be the perfect fit for you.



ABOUT THE ROLE:

We are seeking a high-caliber Strategic Sales Partner to act as the primary operational engine for our Senior Account Executive. You are the "Chief of Staff" for our most complex deal cycles.

This is not a standard virtual assistant role. You are the "operational brain" of the sales cycle, responsible for synthesizing complex information into strategic action. You don't just follow a process; you project manage and steer the process that moves deals forward with clients like Google and Microsoft.



Location: Remote (Philippines / Vietnam / Thailand preferred) 

Job Type: Full-Time (Must overlap with North American Business Hours) 

Reporting to: Senior Account Executive



WHAT YOU'LL DO:



Strategic Deal Synthesis & Risk Identification: 

Attend client meetings and forecast calls to capture "unspoken" nuances. You convert raw meeting notes and AE "brain dumps" into structured, executive-level action plans and tasks while proactively identifying potential "deal-breakers" (e.g., missing technical stakeholders or procurement hurdles). You manage the chasing and completion of these tasks and get help from whichever tea
mber is required internally.



Commercial Pipeline Hygiene: 

Own the "Source of Truth" in the CRM (HubSpot/Salesforce). You are responsible for 100% data integrity, ensuring every deal stage, close date, and opportunity reflects the current reality without the AE ever having to manually enter data.



Operational Intelligence: 

Build and maintain org charts and dossiers on key decision-makers. You ensure the AE never walks into a meeting without a comprehensive briefing on the client's strategic priorities.



The "Time Defender": 

Strategically manage the AE’s inbox and calendar using Google Workspace. You prioritize high-value client communication and draft "executive-ready" replies, ensuring no VIP client is left waiting.



Internal Navigation: 

Drive the deal process internally by pushing paperwork through Legal, Finance, and Security teams to ensure zero deal stagnation.



WHAT YOU'LL BRING:

- Education: Bachelor’s Degree required.

- Experience: 2+ years in a high-performance professional environment. We highly value backgrounds in Management Consulting, Business Operations, or as a Founder’s Associate.

- Technical Precision: Mastery of CRM (HubSpot/Salesforce) and Google Workspace.

- Strategic AI Usage: You use Gemini/AI as a force multiplier for research and synthesis, never as a crutch. You fact-check every output for accuracy and human tone.



* ** Please apply for this position using the following URL: 
 ***

title: SEO LEAD
description:
Role Overview



We are hiring an SEO Team Lead to own and grow our SEO department.



This is not just a technical role.



You will:



Lead SEO strategy across multiple clients



Manage and mentor SEO specialists and content writers



Build scalable SEO systems and processes



Connect SEO performance to real business outcomes



Work closely with the founder and leadership team



You must think strategically and execute consistently.



Key Responsibilities

1. Strategy & Planning



Develop 6–12 month SEO roadmaps



Create cluster and topical authority strategies



Build local SEO strategies for service-based businesses



Align SEO with revenue and lead targets



2. Team Leadership



Manage and mentor SEO specialists



Oversee content writers and editors



Review and improve briefs before execution



Run internal SEO meetings



Improve team processes and documentation



You will be responsible for performance and quality.

Site architecture



Internal linking strategies



Schema implementation



Core Web Vitals



Indexation and crawl management



Redirect and migration planning



GBP optimization and local signals



4. Data & Reporting



Use GA4 and Search Console daily



Track conversions and attribution



Translate SEO metrics into business impact



Identify performance drops and growth opportunities



Present results confidently to clients



5. Process & Systems



Build repeatable SEO SOPs



Implement sprint-based SEO workflows



Use AI tools to improve efficiency



Improve reporting systems





Maintain task accountability through ClickUp or similar tools



Requirements

Experience



4+ years in SEO



Experience leading or mentoring a team



Proven local SEO results



Experience with service-based or local businesses



Agency Experience is a must



Skills



Strong technical SEO knowledge



Ability to create scalable content systems



Clear communication skills



Comfortable leading client calls



Strong analytical mindset



Familiar with AI tools and automation



Work Structure



Remote position



Must overlap at least 3–5 hours with Canada West Coast business hours



Ability to attend strategy calls during PST time zone when required



What We Are Looking For



We want someone who:



Thinks like a business owner



Cares about measurable impact



Takes ownership without being micromanaged



Can challenge weak strategy respectfully



Is calm under pressure



Wants to build something long-term



This is a leadership position, not a junior SEO role.

Direct impact on a growing agency



Leadership authority in the SEO department



Freedom to build systems



Opportunity to scale with the company



Competitive compensation based on experience and performance



How to Apply

One example of a 6-month SEO roadmap you created



A sample content brief

Your time zone and availability overlap with PST

title: Senior AI Automation Engineer (At least 3+ Years n8n Experience
description:
We are a Hong Kong–based AI Automation & n8n consultancy, focused on building real, production-grade automation systems — not demos, not experiments.



We have previously delivered automation projects for a range of organizations, including:



-A Hong Kong listed company (internal process and system automation)

- One of the largest online live-commerce / streaming companies in Hong Kong (sales, operations, and content automation)

-Professional service firms (insurance, engineering, consulting)

-E-commerce brands (Shopify / Shopline)



The Role

We are looking for a  A+ Player Senior AI Automation Engineer who can work independently, think in systems, and deliver high-quality automation solutions.



This is a long-term collaboration, not a short-term freelance gig.(Strong performance may lead to a full-time position.)



What You’ll Be Working On

-Designing and building production-grade n8n workflows

-Deep integration with third-party APIs

-REST APIs

-Webhooks

-OAuth2 / token refresh logic

-Building automation systems such as:

-CRM & lead management pipelines

-Invoice, reporting & reminder systems

-AI-powered content pipelines (text / image / video)

-Internal AI knowledge systems

-Collaborating across frontend, backend, and databases — or handling them yourself

-Turning manual business processes into scalable systems



Requirements (Must-Have)

At least 3 years of real-world experience using n8n in production

Strong experience with API integrations

Solid understanding of:

REST APIs

Webhooks

OAuth2 authentication flows

Full-stack mindset

Basic frontend understanding

Backend logic & system design

Databases (e.g. Supabase, PostgreSQL, MySQL)



Ability to:

Analyze requirements independently

Design clean, scalable automation architectures

Build workflows that are maintainable long-term

Nice to Have (Bonus)

Experience integrating AI / LLMs (OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, etc.)

Experience with Shopify, HubSpot, WhatsApp automation

Strong business logic understanding (not just technical execution)



This Role Is NOT For You If

You need constant supervision to produce decent work

If your output only looks good when someone is checking every detail, fixing your logic, or repeatedly reminding you of basic standards —this role is not for you.We work with people who hold themselves to a standard, even when no one is watching.



If your mindset is:

“Just tell me what to do”

“I’ll do the minimum required”

“I’m not interested in getting better, only getting paid”

Then this role is definitely not for you.



What We Offer

Long-term collaboration (At Least 4 Month)

Fully remote, results-driven work

Extremely Competitive and fair compensation based on skill level

(If you’re the talent we’re looking for, tell us your number — we’ll do our best to keep you.?







Our Current Stage & Team

We are an early-stage startup, currently operating with a lean but highly experienced technical team.

Our core team includes:

A Senior IT Engineer with 7+ years of hands-on experience, responsible for system infrastructure, integrations, and reliability

A Senior Full-Stack Engineer with 20+ years of experience, leading architecture, system design, and complex implementation work

We intentionally keep the team small, senior, and execution-focused. Every engineer works on real systems, real clients, and real business impact — not internal demos or experimental work.



This is a great environment for someone who wants to work alongside experienced engineers, contribute at a system level, and grow with the company long-term.
