title: FUNNEL BUILDER (Part-time)
description:
We’re hiring a Funnel Builder who knows how to architect, build, and optimize conversion-focused funnels using GoHighLevel and automation tools like 
 and Zapier.



This role is for someone who thinks in systems, understands how cold traffic behaves, and builds funnels cleanly and correctly. You are here to design, deploy, and improve funnels.  Your priorities are CRO, reliable automation, and creating a magical client experience from the first time someone interacts with our brand.



—-----------------------------------------------------------------------------



READ THE ENTIRE JOB LISTING CAREFULLY. The final step of the hiring process will require the candidate to provide at least 1 former employer/team lead reference and at least 1 character reference. These will be verified prior to extending an offer.



--- ABOUT THE TEAM ---

Want to work in a rewarding, fast-paced, start-up atmosphere? Looking for significant growth and performance bonus opportunities? Have a growth mindset, value relationships, and dedicated to getting results? Then we might be a fit!



What is it like to work with us? HEAR FROM OUR TEAM!   





Our Team Core Values:

1) DELIGHT THE CLIENT:  We consistently exceed expectations by anticipating needs, delivering outstanding service, and creating those “magic 
nts” where every client feels seen and heard.

2) MASTER YOUR CRAFT:  We commit to continuous learning, share our expertise openly, and tackle every challenge with precision and a deep sense of duty.

3) FOLLOW THROUGH, ALWAYS:  When we say something will happen, it does—every time. We own every task, ensuring that nothing falls through the cracks, and when mistakes occur, we learn and improve immediately.



Our core values are important, and the right candidate will share our values. We are building an awesome place to work, not just managing marketing campaigns for our real estate business.



--- ABOUT YOU ---

Do you think like a funnel and conversion architect? Do you enjoy structuring systems, workflows, and sales psychology that drives measurable results? Are you obsessed with improving KPIs by designing experiments and running tests? Do you take pride in building things properly the first time while still iterating and optimizing?



Then keep reading to see if we're a fit!



Responsibilities:

Funnel Architecture, Buildout & Optimization

- Build complete funnels inside GoHighLevel focused on lead generation

- Structure landing pages with conversion principles in mind

- Create and customize pages, forms, and
s

- Embed forms, manage page layouts, and ensure clean user flow across multiple devices

- Maintain proper tagging architecture and funnel logic



Automations, Workflows & Integrations

- Build and maintain workflows, automations, and multi-step sequences

- Implement conditional logic and clean tag-based systems

- Create 
 automations as needed

- Integrate APIs and third-party tools where required (OPTIONAL, but preferred)

- Set up UTM parameters, tracking codes, and verify traffic source links are set up correctly



Tracking, Optimization & Testing

- Implement Meta Pixel, Google Analytics, and Google Tag Manager (bonus)

- Ensure accurate tracking and data flow across funnels

- Apply an A/B testing mindset to improve conversion rates

- Optimize funnels over time based on performance data and KPIs



Campaign Systems & Deployment

- Maintain clean, scalable campaign structures

- Collaborate with leadership on funnel improvements and testing plans

- Continuously learn and stay up to date on best practices to help brainstorm and make recommendations for improvements to our funnel ecosystem



Requirements:

- STRONG hands-on experience with GoHighLevel, required

- Recent experience with workflows, automations, tags, and sequences, required

- Experience building lead generation funnels (not ecom or dropshipping focused), required

- Experience with 
 and/or Zapier automations, required

- Understanding of conversion rate optimization and buyer behavior, required

- Ability to think in systems and campaign logic, required

- Clean build habits, required

- Moderate familiarity with cold traffic funnels, required

- Strong English communication skills; near-native preferred if involved in testing copy

- Interest in copy, funnel strategy, and optimization (execution-focused)

- A stable, high-speed internet connection, required (at least 150mbps)

- Growth mindset, required



BONUS SKILLS (NOT REQUIRED)

- Meta Ads, Google Ads, or media buying familiarity

- Meta Pixel, GA4, GTM setup experience

- Basic SEO understanding

- API integrations beyond native tools



NOTE: This is a part-time role (5–15 hrs/week) with the opportunity to grow into a full-time position for the right person.



--- APPLICATION & RECRUITMENT PROCESS ---

STEP 1:

Fill out the application form through the link below and write "green kangaroo" in the Additional Comments field.



As part of your application, include a Loom or YouTube video (2 minutes or less) explaining why you believe you’re a strong fit for this specific Funnel Builder role.







STEP 2:

Qualified candidates may be invited to an interview.



STEP 3:

Before extending a trial offer, we will conduct a CHARACTER REFERENCE CHECK for the final candidate(s). CONDUCTING A REFERENCE CHECK will be the last step in the hiring process.



STEP 4:

Upon receiving a trial offer, you will be onboarded as a Funnel Builder with a 90-day PAID trial period. During this period, we expect you to demonstrate your expertise, meet project deadlines, be a team player, and excel at what you do. A successful trial will lead to a permanent offer to join the team.

title: SHORT FORM VIDEO EDITOR | Flexi Schedule
description:
We’re hiring someone who knows how to turn long-form content into sharp, high-retention short videos for platforms like TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts.



This role is for someone who understands pacing, hooks, and visual rhythm in short-form content, and knows how to edit with intention rather than just cutting clips.



—-----------------------------------------------------------------------------



READ THE ENTIRE JOB LISTING CAREFULLY. The final step of the hiring process will require the candidate to provide at least 1 former employer/team lead reference and at least 1 character reference. These will be verified prior to extending an offer.



--- ABOUT THE TEAM ---

Want to work in a rewarding, fast-paced, start-up atmosphere? Looking for significant growth and performance bonus opportunities? Have a growth mindset, value relationships, and dedicated to getting results? Then we might be a fit!



What is it like to work with us? HEAR FROM OUR TEAM!   





Our Core Values:

1) DELIGHT THE CLIENT:  We consistently exceed expectations by anticipating needs, delivering outstanding service, and creating those “magic 
nts” where every client feels seen and heard.

2) MASTER YOUR CRAFT:  We commit to continuous learning, share our expertise openly, and tackle every challenge with precision and a deep sense of duty.

3) FOLLOW THROUGH, ALWAYS:  When we say something will happen, it does—every time. We own every task, ensuring that nothing falls through the cracks, and when mistakes occur, we learn and improve immediately.



Our core values are important and the right candidate will share our values. We are building an awesome place to work, not just cutting together videos for our real estate business.



--- ABOUT YOU ---

Do you have strong creative instincts and know how to spot 
nts that make people stop scrolling? Are you proactive, adaptable, and detail-oriented? Do you have a sharp sense of pacing, an instinct for hooks, and a clear understanding of how short-form videos need to flow to hold attention? Do you take pride in clean edits and delivering videos that feel intentional and finished? Do our core values sound like a fit for who you are?



Then keep reading to see if we're a fit!



Responsibilities:

Short-Form Editing & Story Selection

- Review long-form videos, transcripts, or raw footage to identify short-form clip opportunities

- Select 
nts that are clear, engaging, and platform-appropriate

- Edit vertical videos optimized for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts

- Create strong hooks, clean cuts, and natural pacing

- Deliver publish-ready videos that meet brand and platform standards



Captions, Visuals & Formatting

- Add on-screen captions (burned-in or SRT as required) with proper timing and readability

- Apply basic motion, zooms, punch-ins, and visual emphasis where appropriate

- Follow platform-specific formatting (aspect ratio, duration, safe margins)



Iteration & Workflow

- Implement feedback efficiently and meet agreed turnaround times

- Maintain clear file naming and folder organization

- Track edits, revisions, and delivery status as required



Requirements:

- A STABLE, HIGH-SPEED INTERNET CONNECTION, REQUIRED (at least 150mbps)

- Experience with Final Cut Pro X (or other editing software, such as Adobe After Effects and Premiere Pro) is required

- Strong preference for MacOS users

- Experience editing short-form vertical content for social platforms, required

- Strong understanding of short-form pacing, hooks, and retention

- Experience working from transcripts or long-form content, required

- Clean file organization and understanding of post-production workflo

- Portfolio of completed short-form video projects, required

- General understanding of brand, content marketing, YouTube, etc, required

- GREAT interpersonal and communication skills, required

- Ability to self-start, work on a tight schedule, and manage multiple project deadlines, required

- Ability to follow directions and a LOVE of completing lots of projects according to consistent specifications, required

- Growth mindset, required



--- APPLICATION & RECRUITMENT PROCESS ---

STEP 1:

Fill out the application form through the link below and write "green kangaroo" in the Additional Comments field.


 



STEP 2:

Qualified candidates may be invited to participate in two PAID test projects, $10-20 USD for each test project estimated to be 2-3hrs of work for each (a total of $40 USD!).



STEP 3:

Candidates who advance through the test project rounds will be invited to an interview.



STEP 4:

Before extending a trial offer, we will conduct a CHARACTER REFERENCE CHECK for the final candidate(s). CONDUCTING A REFERENCE CHECK will be the last step in the hiring process.



STEP 5:

Upon receiving a trial offer, you will be onboarded as a Video Editor with a 90-day PAID trial period. During this period, we expect you to demonstrate your video editing expertise, meet project deadlines, be a team player, and excel at what you do. A successful trial will lead to a permanent offer to join the team.

title: Video Editor E-commerce
description:

mber, welcome to the job post. Glad you’re here!

A long-term place in a team that actually values editors, creative designers and not treats them like “just another hire.”



How to apply:



Start your application with “Video Edits"

Include your portfolio, previous work (make sure the link works). It should be easy to see your other work. 



If this sounds like the right fit, we can’t wait to meet you. See you on the first call!

title: Operations Manager - 8-Figure Ecommerce Brand
description:
## About Us



We are a fast-growing DTC nutraceutical company focused on women's health supplements. We've scaled from $0 to over seven figures per month in under a year, and we're just getting started. We're building a world-class remote team and need an Operations Manager who can own the machine that keeps everything running.



## Why This Role Is Critical



Our founder's highest-leverage work is creative strategy and growth. Right now, too much of his time is spent on operational firefighting—managing people, chasing supply chain updates, processing payments, and keeping systems running. This role exists to take full ownership of day-to-day operations so the business can scale without the founder being a bottleneck.



## What You'll Own



### Systems & SOPs



- Build, document, and maintain SOPs for every role and process in Notion

- Ensure every role has a clear playbook so new hires can onboard without tribal knowledge

- Audit and improve existing processes—identify bottlenecks and fix them



### People Management & Accountability



- Manage all tea
mbers day-to-day—you are the primary point of contact for the team

- Track and enforce KPIs on a weekly basis using job scorecards

- Run weekly team standups and 1:1 check-ins

- Conduct monthly and quarterly performance reviews

- Handle underperformance conversations and performance improvement plans

- Process contractor and team payments



### Hiring & Onboarding



- Manage the hiring pipeline when roles open: post jobs, screen applicants, coordinate assessments, schedule interviews

- Build and execute structured onboarding plans for every new hire

- Maintain and update job descriptions and scorecards for all roles



### Supply Chain & Fulfillment



- Own inventory tracking, demand forecasting, and reorder management

- Manage freight logistics and coordinate shipments (China ? US warehouses)

- Manage 3PL relationships—monitor SLAs, resolve issues, optimize costs

- Prevent stockouts and overstock situations through proactive forecasting



### Cost Visibility



- Track recurring business expenses (tools, subscriptions, vendors) and flag anomalies

- Deliver a monthly OPEX summary—where money is going and what looks off



## Requirements



- 2+ years in an operations or project management role in e-commerce or DTC

- Advanced Notion user (required)—you build systems in it, not just use it

- Actively uses AI tools daily to automate work, build systems, and solve problems

- Experience managing remote teams across multiple time zones

- Experience with supply chain: inventory management, 3PL coordination, freight, and demand forecasting

- Comfortable reading basic financials: OPEX tracking, vendor costs, budget vs. actual

- Has experience with hiring processes



## Character Traits We're Looking For



- **Ownership mentality** — treats the business like their own, doesn't wait to be told

- **Systems thinker** — sees a messy process and instinctively documents and fixes it

- **Proactive communicator** — surfaces problems before they escalate, provides updates without being asked

- **Comfortable with hard conversations** — holds people accountable while keeping them motivated

- **Organized to the extreme** — nothing falls through the cracks

- **Resourceful** — figures things out before asking for help



## This Is NOT For You If:



- You need to be told what to do every day

- You think operations is just admin work

- You're not comfortable managing people and having difficult conversations

- You don't actively use AI tools in your daily workflow

- You've never worked in e-commerce or DTC

- You've never built systems or SOPs from scratch

- You can't work autonomously across time zones



## Compensation & Perks



- $50,000–$70,000/year base

- Paid annual leave: 14 calendar days

- Fully remote

- Paid sick days



### How to Apply



If this sounds like you, please fill out the form below and you will hear back from us soon!



[
](
)



SLD Ecommerce is an equal opportunity employer that is committed to diversity and inclusion.



We encourage all applications irrespective of gender, race, sexual orientation, religion, age, nationality, marital status, and disability. We believe that diversity is at the heart of innovation and we welcome passionate candidates from all backgrounds. Come join the family and see for yourself!

title: Intermediate Accountant
description:
Company Description



SBO Financial is a strategic financial management firm delivering more than traditional accounting services. We partner with startups, scaling businesses, and established enterprises to provide high-level accounting, bookkeeping oversight, payroll, budgeting, forecasting, cash flow optimisation, and strategic financial reporting.



Our mission is to equip business owners with forward-looking financial insight that strengthens profitability and supports sustainable growth.



Our team includes Chartered Accountants, CPAs, experienced bookkeepers, and financial professionals who operate with precision, accountability, and commercial awareness.



Role Description



We are seeking a technically strong Intermediate Accountant to join our team in a full-time contractor capacity (38 hours per week).



This role plays an active part in delivering our accounting function to our clients. You will guide our bookkeeping team and support our Client Managers to deliver high quality and timely work for our clients. 



Key responsibilities include:



Bookkeeping transaction validation and responding to your teams queries

Running the End of Month close for your clients and team

Reconciling the Balance sheet and key accounts according to our internal procedures and work methods 

Accounts payable management

Financial and management reporting preparation

Completing BAS, and payroll tax processing and lodgments

Preparing year end return lodgments for review

This position requires availability from 10:00 AM – 6:00 PM AEST, with the ability to commence within 2 weeks. This is an exclusive contractor engagement (no other employment permitted). Contractors must provide their own computer and dedicated workspace.



Qualifications



3+ years’ experience within Australian public practice

Latest Xero certification (mandatory)

High attention to detail and a structured work approach

Excellent written and verbal communication skills

Ability to take ownership and operate with minimal supervision

Experience with inventory systems, payroll, and multi-entity environments will be highly regarded.



IMPORTANT: Please read before applying



To be considered for this role, you must complete your application through the link below:



>>>

Upload the video to

title: Meta DTC Video Editor (UGC & VSL Ads)
description:
We’re hiring a direct response video editor to create high-converting UGC and VSL style ads for paid media.



Important — Communication Requirement

If you are slow to respond, inconsistent with updates, or difficult to communicate with, do not apply. Clear, fast, and reliable communication is mandatory. We only work with editors who are responsive and professional throughout the process.



This is a performance role — we care about pacing, hooks, retention, and conversions, not cinematic editing.



Responsibilities



• Edit UGC & VSL ad creatives

• Produce multiple hook and structure variations

• Work from scripts + raw footage

• Iterate quickly based on feedback

• Deliver fast turnaround batches (24–36 hrs)



Compensation Structure



• Monthly retainer ($2000, performance-based, long-term role)

• Test edit required before onboarding

• Retainer increases + performance bonuses for winning ads



Who We’re Looking For



• Intermediate to experienced direct response editors only

• Strong understanding of ad pacing, hooks, and retention

• Thinks like a marketer, not just an editor

• Handles revisions quickly and efficiently

• Reliable, communicative, and able to meet deadlines consistently



Fast-paced environment. High creative volume. Constant testing.



Send examples of UGC / ad-style edits when applying.

title: Growth & Funnel Optimization Manager (Revenue Systems Role | Remote)
description:
We are a premium interior design and media brand with a strong online presence, engaged audience, digital products, and high-touch services.



Our brand is established.



Our next phase is building a predictable, optimized revenue system.



We are hiring a Growth & Funnel Optimization Manager to help us strengthen, test, and scale our funnels,
 systems, and customer journey.



This is not a VA role.

This is not a basic marketing role.

This is a performance-focused position for someone who understands conversion, systems, and optimization.



You will work directly with the founder.





- YOUR CORE RESPONSIBILITIES -



You will be responsible for improving how traffic becomes revenue.



This includes:



• Auditing existing funnels and landing pages

• Improving conversion rates and user flow

• Building and optimizing
 sequences

• Managing CRM and automation systems

• Identifying “leaks” in the customer journey

• Setting up A/B tests and tracking

• Reporting weekly on performance metrics

• Helping increase lifetime value (LTV)



Your job is to make our systems more effective every month.



- WHO THIS ROLE IS FOR -



This role is for you if:



? You enjoy optimizing systems, not just building them

? You understand funnels,
, and automation deeply

? You think in metrics and improvement cycles

? You’ve worked with coaches, service brands, or info products

? You want a long-term role with growth potential

? You take ownership of results



This role is NOT for you if:



? You only do social media posting

? You only follow instructions without thinking

? You avoid analytics and testing

? You are looking for short-term freelance work



- REQUIRED EXPERIENCE -



You should have experience with:



• Funnel building and optimization

•
 marketing & automation

• CRM systems (GHL, ActiveCampaign, etc.)

• Landing page optimization

• Analytics & reporting

• Conversion-focused design



Bonus if you’ve worked on full customer journeys from lead to sale.



- COMPENSATION -



• Base salary: $1,400–$1,800/month (based on experience)

• Performance bonuses available

• Long-term growth opportunities



This is a serious role with advancement potential.



- HOW TO APPLY -  *IMPORTANT*



To apply, please answer the following:



Share one funnel or system you’ve worked on. What was improved?



What metrics do you track weekly?



How do you approach increasing conversion rates?



What tools have you used most for funnels and automation?



Write “Revenue Systems” in your first line.



Applications without these answers will not be reviewed.



- WHAT SUCCESS LOOKS LIKE -



After 3 months, you should be able to show:



• Improved conversion rates

• Stronger
 performance

• Clear reporting systems

• Better lead-to-sale flow

• Documented optimization process



If you perform well, this role can grow with the company.

title: Leasing Manager (LTR & PadSplit)
description:
Are you great at selling tenants on rentals, screening them fast, and closing deals all the way through lease signing and move-in?



Can you start adding value on day one, taking ownership of listings, leads, and conversions?



We’re a fast-growing property management group managing LTRs and PadSplit homes. We’re looking for someone smart, diligent, and proactive — someone who thrives on results, not supervision.



If you know how to:

- Market and lease properties quickly

- Prequalify and screen tenants effectively

- Coordinate move-ins and manage lead funnels

…then you’ll fit right in.





Long term, you’ll have the chance to build and lead your own leasing team as we scale.





Requirements:

- Strong leasing or property management experience (LTR or co-living preferred)

- Excellent spoken and written English (C2 level)

- High attention to detail, strong follow-through, and responsive communication

- Available to work U.S. EST/ET hours





If this sounds like you, we’d love to hear from you. Apply now and start making an impact immediately.





DO NOT APPLY IF:



Your English is not near-native or highly fluent (C2 level).

You do not have a strong leasing background.

You do not have a background in sales.

You are not tech-savvy.

You are not detail-oriented and highly diligent.

You need constant supervision or struggle to take ownership.





Application Process:

- Submit your resume and a short video introduction (via Google Drive or Loom — make sure the link is accessible). In your video, briefly introduce yourself and share why you’d be great for this role.

- Send us a message on OnlineJobs.ph explaining why you’re the right fit and what makes you stand out.

- Wait for our response — we carefully review every application and will contact shortlisted candidates for the next steps.



Thank you!

title: Sales Specialist - 10k USD/Month - High Ticket Sales
description:
Make 10,000 USD by making 200 calls per day. 



Are you a top seller, always hitting targets but feeling capped, doing all the hard work yet your income doesn’t match your effort?



This is your chance to change that. Work hard now, earn more than you ever have, and build the freedom, security, and lifestyle you’ve always wanted. The hours are long — 9-hour EST shifts with a 12-hour availability window, 6 days a week — but the rewards are massive: $600 USD base or commissions, whichever is higher, and uncapped earnings. High performers make $10,000 per month by only making 200 calls per day.



What You’ll Do:

Follow up with warm leads and past visitors

Convert inquiries and trial users into paying customers and subscriptions

Guide buyers through product and subscription options

Maintain accurate performance records



Why Top Closers Join Us:

600 USD Base pay so you can ease into commissions 

Unlimited Commissions: $2,000–$10,000+/month based on performance

High-Caliber Leads: Warm, pre-qualified prospects only – no cold calling

Winning Team: Work alongside other elite closers in a results-driven, growth-focused environment

Career Growth: Opportunities to expand your skills, influence, and leadership potential



Ideal Candidate:

Proven experience in remote sales, telesales, or performance-based roles

Thrives on closing high-value deals and being part of a top-performing team



What You’ll Do



Follow up with warm leads and past visitors

Convert trial users into paying customers and subscriptions

Guide buyers through product and subscription options

Maintain accurate performance records



Why This Role Stands Out

600 Base pay - This is just for easing top closers into commission structure.

Unlimited Earnings: Skilled closers earn $6,000–$10,000/month, with no caps holding you back

Warm Leads Only: Focus on qualified prospects — no cold calling

Growth & Opportunity: Scale your income, skills, and influence within a high-performing team



What We Provide

CRM access, sales scripts, and ongoing trainin

Peer support and regular check-ins

Bi-weekly payouts and performance incentives



Ideal Candidate

Proven remote sales or telesales experience

Self-motivated, disciplined, and results-driven

Available for night shift hours (PH time)

Loves closing high-value deals

title: Media Buyer for 8-figure brand
description:
Media Buyer Purpose



The purpose of the Media Buyer role at BECH & YD ECOM is first & foremost to be rock-solid in managing the day-to-day of ad accounts & making data-based decisions that drive revenue for our Shopify brands.



As a media buyer, you take pride in doing all the little things correctly & have evidence to prove your reliability & trustworthiness. Managing tens of thousands of dollars per month of someone else’s capital means it is your duty to pay immense attention to detail with every action you take.



You are also on the front lines of all things data for clients. This means you as the Media Buyer need to be accountable & take the initiative in analyzing, interpreting, and reporting that data with the team in order for all of us to make more informed & better decisions, faster.



Your active purpose at BECH & YD ECOM is to work alongside our Strategist & Creative Team to manage & move quickly in ad accounts to get ads live, follow our media buying systems & frameworks to make smart decisions, and analyze & report data to ensure we are hitting our goals month over month.



Media Buyer Primary Roles 



Onboarding:

Performing quality checks on Meta Business Managers

Doing research to find the top-performing ads

Learning and embracing the BECH & YD ECO
dia buying structure



Ongoing:

Create & set dynamic creative tests weekly following the guidance of the creative team

Understand KPIs to scale budgets up & down following the BECH & YD ECOM Scaling Process

Attend weekly team calls to communicate directly with the creative team & strategist on ad account performance

Complete weekly & monthly data reports

Leverage attribution tools & senior strategists for smart decision-making 

Communicate with the team daily on performance

Share any ad concepts or ideas based on data interpretation

Download and upload organic content from social platforms



Qualifications & Character Traits 



Direct Experience Qualifications

Setting up & launching Meta ads for Shopify business

Managing ad accounts spending above $1000 per day

Setting up & troubleshooting tracking for Meta Ads

Analyzing data & providing reports to a team

Working in a team environment & understanding individual roles



CHARACTER TRAITS

Excruciating level of attention to detail with all responsibilities

Moves quickly & is easily accessible 

Extremely well organized, punctual & able to keep order amidst chaos.

Time-efficient with tasks but willing to spend extra time to make things right

Ability to interpret & communicate data effectively with a team

Accountable & reliable person inside of the ad account & outside

Communicates effectively with the team & shares ideas

Coachable & desire to grow their skill set & personal traits





This is NOT For You If: 

You do not pay close attention to detail

You don’t have experience running Meta ads

You are a slow mover

You are not a good communicator 

You don’t like a high-operating environment

You are unorganized

You are not a team player 

You don’t understand eCommerce

You are not passionate about growth 



Compensation



• Starting salary: $5 per hour + Performance-Based Bonuses

• Work week: 6 days a week



Growth Potential 



At BECH & YD ECOM, we highly value growth and development in all areas. With great performance, the potential for you as a Media Buyer is significant.



Important Application Requirement

title: CRO specialist
description:
## Job Opening: CRO Specialist – Shopify (Continuous Optimization)



**Location:** Remote / Hybrid

**Hours:** 32–40 per week

**Contract:** Full-time / Freelance (open to discussion)



### About the Role



We are looking for a **Conversion Rate Optimization (CRO) Specialist** who takes full ownership of the **continuous optimization of our Shopify store**. You will analyze data, identify conversion bottlenecks, and run structured A/B tests while directly implementing improvements in the Shopify codebase.



This is a **hands-on, execution-driven role**. You are expected to test, build, measure, and iterate—making decisions based on data, not opinions.



---



## Responsibilities



* Own and execute a **continuous CRO roadmap**

* Design, launch, and analyze **A/B tests**

* Identify and fix conversion leaks across the funnel:



  * Product pages (PDP)

  * Cart

  * Checkout

* Optimize:



  * UX and user flows

  * Product page structure, copy, and trust elements

  * Checkout and payment experience

* Work with data from:



  * Shopify Analytics

  * Google Analytics (GA4)

  * Heatmaps and session recordings

* **Directly implement changes in Shopify**, including:



  * Liquid

  * HTML / CSS

  * (Basic to intermediate) JavaScript

* Translate insights into measurable improvements

* Document test results and optimization learnings



---



## Requirements



* Proven experience as a **CRO Specialist** in e-commerce

* Strong understanding of **A/B testing methodology**

* Hands-on experience with **Shopify development**

* Data-driven mindset: hypotheses ? testing ? conclusions

* Ability to work independently and take ownership

* Strong analytical and commercial thinking



### Technical Skills



* Shopify (Liquid)

* HTML / CSS

* JavaScript (basic to intermediate)

* Analytics tools (GA4, Shopify Analytics, Hotjar or similar)

* A/B testing tools (VWO, Convert, Google Optimize, etc.)



---



## Nice to Have



* Experience with high-traffic Shopify stores

* Experience with subscriptions, bundles, or upsell flows

* Knowledge of UX and behavioral psychology

* Page speed and performance optimization experience



---



## What We Offer



* Full ownership over CRO and conversion performance

* Direct impact on revenue and growth

* Freedom to test, experiment, and optimize

* Competitive salary or freelance rate

* Work in a fast-growing, performance-driven e-commerce environment



---



## How to Apply



Please send:



* Your CV or LinkedIn profile

* A short motivation

* (Optional) CRO cases, A/B test results, or Shopify optimization examples

description:

We’re Body & Bra. A fast-growing lingerie and shapewear brand trusted by 170,000+ women worldwide who’ve felt overlooked by traditional lingerie. Most bra brands force women to choose between support and comfort. We don’t. We design essentials that actually support — without pain, wires, or compromises.

This is a hands-on, people-first role where clarity, care, and communication matter. You’ll work closely with our fulfillment team, our customer service team, and of course, our customers. You’ll be handling questions, solving problems, and keeping everything moving with empathy and efficiency.



If you love structure but can adapt on the fly, thrive in remote teams, and genuinely enjoy creating a great customer experience, we’d love to hear from you.

 with empathy, clarity and efficiency

What makes you a great fit?

title: FULL-TIME OUTBOUND CALLER (B2B – UK BUSINESSES)
description:
We are hiring a reliable remote caller to contact businesses in the UK and introduce our service.



This is a phone-based role.

You will spend most of your day speaking to new people.



You are NOT selling or closing deals — your job is to start conversations and book short discovery calls.



ROLE RESPONSIBILITIES

• call businesses from our list

• ask short questions

• log outcomes in tracker

• book intro calls for manager



WORK HOURS

Monday–Friday

9:00 AM – 5:00 PM UK TIME

(please apply only if you can work this schedule consistently)



PAY

$5.25 per hour base



daily activity bonuses



meeting bonuses



Typical monthly earnings: $1,000 – $1,400

Paid weekly



PERFORMANCE EXPECTATION

80–120 calls per day



This is a consistent calling role, not occasional calling.



REQUIREMENTS

• clear spoken English

• confident speaking on the phone

• stable wired internet connection

• USB headset (not laptop microphone)

• quiet working environment

• able to followscript and schedule

• reliable attendance



Outbound calling or appointment-setting experience preferred.



IMPORTANT

This role suits people comfortable speaking to strangers for several hours daily.

It is not customer support, chat support, or social media work.



HIRING PROCESS

Shortlisted applicants will complete a live call test.



TO APPLY (REQUIRED)

Send:



45–60 second voice recording introducing yourself



Screenshot of internet speed



Confirm you are comfortable making 100 calls/day



Applications without voice recording will not be reviewed.

Key Skills and Responsibilities:



Automation Excellence:

mbers to identify opportunities for automation across various departments and implement solutions to drive productivity gains.

Workflow Enhancement:

mbers on HubSpot workflows, best practices, and system capabilities to drive user adoption, enhance productivity, and optimise the platform's use.

Pipeline Development Expertise:

•Collaborate with sales and marketing teams to define lead scoring criteria, develop lead nurturing strategies, automate lead qualification processes, and accelerate sales cycle progression.

Reporting Mastery:

•Work closely with colleagues to understand reporting requirements, develop custom reporting solutions, and continuously refine reporting processes to meet evolving business needs.

•Collaborate with tea
mbers to develop automated reporting processes and scheduled reports to streamline data delivery and improve decision-making efficiency.



Qualifications:

•Proven experience in HubSpot administration and implementation, focusing on automation, streamlining workflows, optimising pipeline strategies, and refining reporting.

•Familiarity with specific HubSpot modules such as Marketing Hub, Sales Hub, Service Hub, Content Hub, Operations Hub, and Commerce Hub.

•Strong analytical skills and the ability to translate data into actionable insights.

•Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively across teams and departments.

•Detail-oriented with a proactive mindset and a passion for continuous improvement.

title: Amazon Listing Image Designer (Adobe + AI Workflow)
description:
Remote | Long-Term | Performance-Driven E-Commerce Brand



We are an established international e-commerce company selling premium products on Amazon (US & EU marketplaces).

We are looking for a skilled Amazon Listing Image Designer who understands conversion rate optimisation, visual hierarchy, and premium brand positioning.



This is not basic Canva work.



We design images to increase CTR and conversion rate — not just to “look nice.”





What We Care About

• Clean composition?

• Premium look & feel?

• Clear benefit-driven messaging?

• Attention to detail?





What You’ll Do

• Create full Amazon 7–9 image sets?

• Design A+ Content modules?

• Optimise existing listings for higher conversion?

• Create realistic lifestyle composites in Photoshop?

• Retouch and enhance product photography?

• Develop infographics that communicate benefits clearly?

• Use AI tools (ChatGPT, Gemini, image generation tools) to speed up concept development and creative testing





Required Skills

Must Have:

• Advanced Adobe Photoshop (layered PSD workflows)?

• Illustrator and/or InDesign?

• Experience designing Amazon listing images?

• Strong understanding of:

* Amazon main image compliance

* Conversion-focused layout structure

* Typography hierarchy

* Scroll-stopping thumbnails

* Lifestyle compositing



You must be comfortable using AI tools for creative ideas, product image generation and lifestyle photography. Access to AI tools will be provided.





Nice to Have

• Experience in outdoor, camping, or electronics brands?

• Understanding of A/B testing creatives?

• Experience working with marketing teams





Compensation

Open to:?

• Part-time?

• Full-time?

• Per listing pricing



Compensation depends on skill and experience.

Long-term opportunity for the right person.





To Apply (Important)

Please include:

1. Your portfolio (with examples of Amazon listing images, Premium A+ content)

2. Links to 3 listings you designed (if available)

3. Describe your experience with designing Amazon listings. What makes a high-converting Amazon listing image?

4. Describe your experience using AI image generation tools.

5. Rate yourself (1–10):

    * Photoshop

    * Illustrator

    * InDesign

    * AI tool proficiency

6. Your expected salary or per-listing or per image rate.

title: Graphic Designer – Product Photography, Amazon Images, and Full-Service Visual Design
description:
I'm looking for a talented graphic designer who can take raw images and rough concepts and turn them into polished, professional visuals that actually sell. I work with physical products that need to look stunning online—and I need someone who can clean up product photos, remove backgrounds, swap colors to show different finishes, and make every image look like it came out of a professional studio. But that's just the starting point.



This role is about more than just photo editing. I need a designer who understands how visuals communicate, how to guide a buyer's eye, and how to make someone stop scrolling and pay attention. Whether it's a hero image on an Amazon listing, an infographic that explains a product's features at a glance, or a company catalog that makes our brand look polished and professional—I need someone who genuinely cares about the quality of the final product.



What I need you to be able to do:

Expert-level image editing in Photoshop, InDesign, Lightroom, Illustrator, or similar tools. You should be able to take a photo shot in less-than-ideal conditions and make it look studio-quality. Background removal is a core part of this role and needs to be clean and precise—no jagged edges, no obvious cutouts.



Product color variation editing—showing the same product in multiple finishes or colorways without a separate photoshoot for each one. If you know how to do this convincingly, that's a huge advantage.



Amazon listing image creation—you should understand what makes a main image convert, how to build an infographic that communicates value quickly, and how to put together a full image set including hero shots, lifestyle images, feature callouts, and comparison graphics.



Beyond product photography, I also need someone who handles the full range of graphic design work: catalogs and PDFs, logo design, website design assets, social media graphics, and anything else that falls under "this needs to look great."

What kind of person I'm looking for:



I want someone who has creative direction and brings their own eye to the work. If you see a better way to frame a product, a layout that communicates more clearly, or a color treatment that makes something pop—speak up. I'm not looking for someone who just executes instructions without thinking. I want a collaborator who cares about what the design is actually trying to accomplish.



You should be organized, self-directed, and able to manage multiple projects at once. I'll be sending raw assets and short briefs regularly (and sometimes it may be as simple as create a great looking presentation using these words and here are a few reference images), and I need to trust that you'll deliver on time without constant follow-up. If you're going to miss a deadline or run into a problem, communicate early—that's all I ask. I will be using a tool like trello to track projects and timelines. To confirm you've read this entire post, please use the subject line "Pickle" when you reach out.



Hours and availability:

This is a part-time position. I need you available Monday through Friday, 1:00pm–6:00pm Spain time (Madrid, GMT+1). I'm based in Spain, so being available during these hours is important for collaboration and quick turnarounds.



Pay and schedule:

All hours are tracked and calculated based on California time (GMT-8) for consistency with my other tea
mbers. I pay twice a month via Wise—on the 1st and 16th. The payment on the 16th covers work from the 1st–15th, and the payment on the 1st covers the 16th through the end of the month.



How to apply:

 me directly at 
 do not apply through the OnlineJobs.ph messaging system as I do not monitor those messages. If you have worked for a company like Design Pickle, that will be a huge bonus, as you are used to working with various projects at the same time.



Include your portfolio or work samples—before/after product photo edits are especially valuable. I want to see background removal work, color variation edits, Amazon listing images, and any other design work you're proud of.



As part of the process, I'll send you a test project using a real product image or brief. This is unpaid, but it's the only way for me to evaluate your skills and make sure we're a good fit before committing to work together. If that goes well, I will likely ask you to do a paid test so I can further evaluate your skill.



Looking forward to finding someone who can make every product and every brand asset look as good as it deserves to.



Please note: You must be based in the Philippines. If you are based elsewhere—India, Bangladesh, Pakistan, or anywhere outside the Philippines—please do not apply.
